top_categories.workout_context: Reliance Deep Woods rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Reliance Deep Woods’s tn mountains, forest gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Reliance Deep Woods isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Reliance Deep Woods when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Reliance Deep Woods. Make this intensity feel like home.
Reliance Deep Woods’s tn mountain gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Reliance Deep Woods’s tn mountain gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
The varied gradients at Reliance Deep Woods reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Reliance Deep Woods — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Reliance Deep Woods — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on tn mountain gravel.
The Norwegian double-threshold method builds the sustained power base for Reliance Deep Woods — massive training stimulus without the recovery cost of VO2max work.
Low-cadence force work builds the muscular strength for Reliance Deep Woods’s 4,500ft of climbing — especially the grinding, low-speed ascents.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Reliance Deep Woods’s 65 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Reliance Deep Woods requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on tn mountain gravel to build confidence. Expect: tn mountains, forest gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 65 miles of tn mountain gravel in Tennessee.
